Articles.Content: So in all the IVA tutorials/questions I see prop tools referenced for adding props. However I have never seen that component in unity. I can add props via the config file but is there a faster/easier way? Also, is adding a MFDU from RPM any different from adding a stock prop?

You want this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65356-0-23-PartTools

RPM components take a lot more to configure, but prop placement for them works exactly the same.

You want this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65356-0-23-PartTools

RPM components take a lot more to configure, but prop placement for them works exactly the same.

Can I keep using the .20 part tools or do I need the .23?

Can I keep using the .20 part tools or do I need the .23?

I don't remember if they got rid of the proxy-IVA-populating system in .20 or .23, but the current PartTools makes placing props in IVA super easy by loading the IVA model and letting you move actual prop models around. If that isn't in .20 PartTools, then yes, you need .23.
